title: Black Bean Salad with Corn, Red Peppers and Avocado in a Lime-Cilantro Vinaigrette
directions: Combine all ingredients except for avocados in a large bowl and mix well. Cover and chill for a few hours or overnight. Right before serving, add avocados and mix gently, being careful not to mash avocados. Garnish with a more chopped cilantro if desired. Serve at room temperature.
ingredients: 2 15-ounce cans black beans, rinsed and drained
3 ears fresh cooked corn, kernels cut off the cob
2 tablespoons minced shallots, from one medium shallot
9 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, best quality such as Colavita
1 teaspoon lime zest (be sure to zest limes before juicing them)
1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, plus more for garnish
